Module com.ning.breakout
Package com.ning.breakout

Class StartGame

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
com.ning.breakout.StartGame
public class StartGame extends javafx.application.Application
StartGame is the Main class of the project which takes the responsibility of initializing the game board, switching scenes, transferring data between scenes and starting the program.
Author:
Ning ZHU - modified

    • resetGameBoard

      public void resetGameBoard()
      Resets the game board when user clicks the play button in the main menu.

      Because the color theme of the game board may be changed, we need to reset the source image of the view of the components of the game board.

      See Also:
      • GameBoard

  Modified from the original source code:
  public static void main(String[] args){
      EventQueue.invokeLater(() -> new GameFrame().initialize());
  }
